Method Detail

addNewsToFile

public int addNewsToFile(Element ele)
addNewsToFile is a simulated process for adding the newly pulled news to the database file.

Parameters:
ele - A Node sent from the News class containing all the information of the news.
Returns:
Returns the ID number of the newly added news back to News class.

getContent

public String getContent(int id)
getContent will return the content of the given news.

Parameters:
id - ID number of the news.
Returns:
Returns the content of the news that is being passed.

getCurrentID

public int getCurrentID()
getCurrentID will return the current count of the news that is in the database.

Returns:
Returns the count of the news in the database.

getTime

public String getTime(int id)
getTime will return a formatted time when the expected news happened.

Parameters:
id - ID number of the news.
Returns:
Returns a string representation of the time when the news happened.
